death.attack.hyperthermia_instant: %s was grilled into a hot dog.
death.attack.hyperthermia_instant.player: %s was grilled into a hot dog.
gui.frostedheart.debug.clear_cache: Clear tip cache (Read from the file again)
gui.frostedheart.generator.no_enough_spa: No enough space, there must be space of %s x %s x %s around the generator
gui.frostedheart.minigame.can_start: Click reset button at bottom right to start a paper
gui.frostedheart.minigame.display: Game Rules(Hover on text to magnify)
gui.frostedheart.minigame.no_clue: All paperworks for this research has completed
gui.frostedheart.minigame.no_ink: No suitable ink for this research.
gui.frostedheart.minigame.no_paper: No suitable paper for this research.
gui.frostedheart.minigame.t1: Your goal is to clear the board. Select  a free element and then another matching element to remove both of them.
gui.frostedheart.minigame.t2: To free an element, You should make its two adjacent sides the corner between them empty, off the board is consider empty.
gui.frostedheart.minigame.t3: The four basic elements can match with others of the same type, while "Discovery" matches "Dilemma".
gui.frostedheart.minigame.t4: "Transform" matches with any of the basic elements or itself
gui.frostedheart.minigame.t5: Roman numbers matches with "Research", but only in the ascending order. After all numbers are gone, click "Conclusion" to remove it.
gui.frostedheart.minigame.tired_to_resea: I can't think of anything. Maybe I should take a rest.
gui.frostedheart.save_update_needed: Your save is outdated, Cannot auto update your save! Please exit world and delete %s to complete update!
gui.frostedheart.save_updated: Auto updated your save, old configuration backed-up at
gui.frostedheart.trade.discounted_offeri: This deal is in my favor.
gui.frostedheart.trade.no_bargain: I need a better relationship with him to bargain
gui.frostedheart.trade.not_enough_offeri: You did not provide enough offer
gui.frostedheart.trade.not_needed_now: This item is not needed now
gui.frostedheart.trade.title: Trading
gui.frostedheart.trade.unwilling: The villager are not willing to provide things because of low relationship.
gui.jei.info.require_research: Some recipes may require more research to display. If you finished corresponding research, please turn to other page to check out recipes.
message.frostedheart.campfire.fuel: Throw some fuel on the fire before igniting again.
message.frostedheart.campfire.remaining: This campfire will burn for %s seconds
message.frostedheart.cow.nomilk.digest: This cow cannot produce milk now.
message.frostedheart.cow.nomilk.hungry: This cow is too hungry to produce milk. Feed it dry grass or wheat.
message.frostedheart.crank.feel_hunger: I'm too hungry to use this crank.
message.frostedheart.crop_no_bonemeal: Soil temperature here is too low. Fertilizers do not take effect under %s
message.frostedheart.crop_not_growable: Soil temperature here is too low. This crop won't grow under %s
message.frostedheart.eaten_poisonous_foo: You should not eat raw meat!
message.frostedheart.energy.full: I feel energetic, everything is a piece of cake.
message.frostedheart.energy.full.0: I feel energetic, curious, and ready to solve hard problems.
message.frostedheart.energy.full.1: Clear mind, full of energy, ready to work.
message.frostedheart.energy.full.2: My mind is crystal clear, eager to learn new things.
message.frostedheart.energy.lack: I feel very sad, maybe I should treat myself.
message.frostedheart.energy.lack.0: Exhausted today... I miss delicious foods.
message.frostedheart.energy.lack.1: My curiosity is fainting... I wonder about the unknown lands.
message.frostedheart.energy.lack.2: Nature always heals a tiring soul. I should walk around.
message.frostedheart.energy.suit: Today is fine, making progress is just well.
message.frostedheart.energy.suit.0: Today is fine, making progress is just well.
message.frostedheart.energy.suit.1: Normal snow, normal day... I wonder what I can do today.
message.frostedheart.energy.suit.2: I feel a little tired, but I can still work.
message.frostedheart.food.cold: Eating cold food is not a good idea.
message.frostedheart.food.frozen: It's hard as ice! I should warm it up.
message.frostedheart.food.hot: Warmth is pouring into my body.
message.frostedheart.forecast.morning:
Morning Weather Forecast:
 Morning: %s
 Noon: %s
 Night: %s
 Midnight: %s
 Tomorrow Morning: %s
message.frostedheart.forecast.night:
Evening Weather Forecast:
 Tonight: %s
 Midnight: %s
 Tomorrow Morning: %s
 Tomorrow Noon: %s
 Tomorrow Night: %s
message.frostedheart.refugee.hired: How are you doing, %s? Let's work together in your town.
message.frostedheart.refugee.needs: Hello, my name is %s %s. I need some hot, warm foods...
message.frostedheart.refugee.satisfied: Thank you, you saved me. I will now join your town.
message.frostedheart.research.cannot_use: I don't yet know how to use this.
message.frostedheart.research.multiblock: I have no idea how to build it. I need more research.
message.frostedheart.research.not_owned: This is not my paper. I can't understand its content
message.frostedheart.research.too_cold: My finger is shivering in the coldness...
message.frostedheart.research.too_dark: This place is too dark to write anything...
message.frostedheart.temperature_help: If your locale use fahrenheit, you can change display in frostedheart client config
message.frostedheart.too_cold_to_transmu: The Philosopher Stone lost its power.
message.frostedheart.village.unknown: hmmm...hmm e dnot udnrsootd wah u mean
research.aluminum_extraction.desc: Make your bauxite useful with chemistry.
research.aluminum_extraction.name: Aluminum Extraction
research.category.desc.frostedheart.expl: Explore the world and find clues to unveil the mystery.
research.category.desc.frostedheart.prod: Build the base that supports you.
research.coal_hand_stove.desc: Your engineers develop the brilliant way to carry warmth. It is a good travel buddy when you go into blizzards.
research.coal_hand_stove.name: Coal Hand Stove
research.generator_t1.name: Generator T1
research.generator_t2.desc: Utilizing the power of pressured steam, it is possible to devise a more powerful heat source for your base.
research.generator_t2.name: Generator T2
research.generator_t3.desc: Fluid bed burning allows liquid fuel to power the Generator and enhance its abilities.
research.generator_t3.name: Generator T3
research.generator_t4.desc: Engineers now have the ability to exploit the geothermal power beneath the bedrock to power the Generator.
research.generator_t4.name: Generator T4
research.mechanics.desc: Classical Newtonian physics opens the new page for mechanics study. An important study for any engineer.
research.mechanics.name: Newtonian Mechanics
research.snow_boots.desc: This pair of boots allows you to travel faster on snowy ground.
research.snow_boots.name: Snow Boots
research.steam_cannon.desc: Combining physics and engineering, you are able to create a decent long range weapon.
research.steam_cannon.name: Steam Cannon
research.steam_properties.desc: Studying the heat and fluid properties of steam brings possible new applications of this heat-carrying fluid.
research.steam_properties.name: Steam Properties
research.sulfuric_acid.desc: Your scientists have a brilliant method to produce sulfuric acid experimentally. The substance may be proven useful for various production.
research.sulfuric_acid.name: Sulfuric Acid Preparation
tetra.module.double/basic_pro_pick.descr: A prospector pick head, useful in detecting ores around.
tetra.module.double/basic_pro_pick.name: Prospector Pick Head
tetra.module.single/basic_core_spade.des: A core spade head, useful in detect rock and mineral underneath
tetra.module.single/basic_geo_hammer.des: A geologists hammer head with given materials, useful in detecting ores around.

tooltip.frostedheart.double_stick_igniti: Hold two sticks on each hand to use them as a fire starter.
tooltip.frostedheart.handstove.add_fuel: Craft with any coal sticks to fuel.
tooltip.frostedheart.handstove.trash_ash: Full of ash! Click and hold at ground to deplete ash.
tooltip.frostedheart.ignition_material: A piece of material to light fire, but you need a metal to complete the ignition.
tooltip.frostedheart.ignition_metal: A piece of metal to light fire, but you need a material to complete the ignition.
tooltip.frostedheart.ignition_tutorial: Hold this item and either of the following items on each hand to use them as a fire starter:
tooltip.frostedheart.inspire_item: Inspect this in drawing desk yields inspiration
tooltip.frostedheart.meme.mushroom: Warm it up with your body for your dinner!
tooltip.frostedheart.meme.thermos: Don't misunderstood as the server brand
tooltip.frostedheart.mushroom: Hold knife in one hand and use this to cut down
tooltip.frostedheart.rankine.dry_mortar: Soak in water for a while to get mortar
tooltip.frostedheart.research_is_locked: Research is locked! Complete these research:

tooltip.frostedheart.rubbing.points.hint: Examine in drawing desk to obtain research points

tooltip.frostedheart.weather_helmet: Gear it up to receive weather forecast at morning and evening
tooltip.frostedheart.weather_radar: Carry it with you to receive weather forecast at morning and evening
